subject: Golf
Masters Golf Tournament
lead_paragraph: The incongruity between the austerity of his childhood in Australia and the affluence of his life in America is not lost on Jason Day, who is expected to contend for the Masters title this week.
snippet: The incongruity between the austerity of his childhood in Australia and the affluence of his life in America is not lost on Jason Day, who is expected to contend for the Masters title this week.
